languages.text: "Конклав намерен добыть все реликвии, принадлежавшие святому Когнацию, какие возможно. Поскольку данный святой является фигурой легендарной, в Просторе Коронус множеству вещей приписывается связь с ним. Но вряд ли кто-то из хозяев реликвий пожелает расстаться с ними. Как Орден Молота собирается истребовать их — вопрос, зависящий от личности следующего настоятеля".

"The conclave aims to procure all the relics that once belonged to Saint Cognatius, all that can possibly be procured. Given that the saint is a legendary figure, many items in the Koronus Expanse have an alleged connection to him. However, it seems unlikely that any of the relics' owners will be eager to part with them. The answer to the question of how the Order of the Hammer is going to retrieve them depends on the identity of its next prelate."
languages.original_text: "Конклав намерен добыть все реликвии, принадлежавшие святому Когнацию, какие возможно. languages.text: «El cónclave busca reunir todas las reliquias que pertenecieron a san Cognatius, o por lo menos todas las que pueda. Puesto que un santo es una figura legendaria, hay muchos objetos en la Extensión de Koronus a los que se atribuye alguna relación con el santo. Sin embargo, parece poco probable que los actuales propietarios de las reliquias vayan a querer desprenderse de ellas. La forma que tendrá la Orden del Martillo de recuperarlas dependerá de su siguiente prelado».
languages.original_text: "The conclave aims to procure all the relics that once belonged to Saint Cognatius, all that can possibly be procured. Given that the saint is a legendary figure, many items in the Koronus Expanse have an alleged connection to him. However, it seems unlikely that any of the relics' owners will be eager to part with them. The answer to the question of how the Order of the Hammer is going to retrieve them depends on the identity of its next prelate."

languages.text: « Le conclave s'est donné pour mission de rassembler, dans la mesure du possible, toutes les reliques ayant appartenu à Saint Cognatius. En raison de la légende qui entoure cet illustre personnage, on trouve dans les Étendues de Koronus un grand nombre d'objets ayant un lien, supposé ou réel, avec lui. Dans tous les cas, il est très peu probable que leurs propriétaires acceptent de s'en séparer facilement. Quant à savoir quelles méthodes l'Ordre du Marteau emploiera pour récupérer ces reliques, cela dépendra entièrement de l'identité de son prochain prélat. »
languages.original_text: "The conclave aims to procure all the relics that once belonged to Saint Cognatius, all that can possibly be procured. Given that the saint is a legendary figure, many items in the Koronus Expanse have an alleged connection to him. The answer to the question of how the Order of the Hammer is going to retrieve them depends on the identity of its next prelate."

languages.text: “修会打算取回圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的所有遗物，至少先取回容易回收的那一部分。这位传奇圣人的名号实在太响，科罗努斯扩区有许多人都宣称，说他们持有的某件物品与那位圣人有着千丝万缕的联系，不过，那些物品的主人似乎也并不急于脱手。至于重锤修会要如何取回这些遗物，只能取决于下一任教长的打算了。”
languages.original_text: "The conclave aims to procure all the relics that once belonged to Saint Cognatius, all that can possibly be procured. Given that the saint is a legendary figure, many items in the Koronus Expanse have an alleged connection to him. However, it seems unlikely that any of the relics' owners will be eager to part with them. The answer to the question of how the Order of the Hammer is going to retrieve them depends on the identity of its next prelate."

traits.locale_text: “修会打算取回圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的所有遗物，至少先取回容易回收的那一部分。这位传奇圣人的名号实在太响，科罗努斯扩区有许多人都宣称，说他们持有的某件物品与那位圣人有着千丝万缕的联系，不过，那些物品的主人似乎也并不急于脱手。至于圣锤修会要如何取回这些遗物，只能取决于下一任教长的打算了。”

languages.text: 「コンクラーベの目的は、かつて聖コグナティウスが所有していた聖遺物を、可能な限りすべて回収することにあります。聖コグナティウスは伝説的な人物であるため、コロヌス・エクスパンスには彼と関係があるとされる遺物が数多く存在します。ですが、聖遺物の持ち主がそれを手放したがるとは思えません。鉄槌の修道会がどのように聖遺物を回収するかは、次の上級聖職者がどのような人物であるかにかかっています」
languages.original_text: "The conclave aims to procure all the relics that once belonged to Saint Cognatius, all that can possibly be procured. Given that the saint is a legendary figure, many items in the Koronus Expanse have an alleged connection to him. However, it seems unlikely that any of the relics' owners will be eager to part with them. The answer to the question of how the Order of the Hammer is going to retrieve them depends on the identity of its next prelate."

traits.locale_text: 「コンクラーベの目的は、かつて聖コグナティウスが所有していた聖遺物を、可能な限りすべて回収することにあります。聖コグナティウスは伝説的な人物であるため、コロヌス・エクスパンスには彼と関係があるとされる遺物が数多く存在します。ですが、聖遺物の持ち主がそれを手放したがるとは思えません。鉄槌の修道会がどのように聖遺物を回収するかは、次の上級聖職者がどのような人物であるかにかかっています」

languages.text: "Die Konklave möchte alle Reliquien des Heiligen Cognatius beschaffen, alle, die sich irgendwie beschaffen lassen. Da der Heilige eine solch legendäre Gestalt ist, gibt es in der Koronus-Ausdehnung viele Gegenstände, die angeblich mit ihm in Verbindung stehen. Es erscheint jedoch unwahrscheinlich, dass die Eigentümer dieser Relikte sie bereitwillig abgeben. Die Antwort auf die Frage, wie der Orden des Hammers sie in seinen Besitz bringen will, hängt davon ab, wer der nächste Prälat des Ordens ist."
languages.original_text: "The conclave aims to procure all the relics that once belonged to Saint Cognatius, all that can possibly be procured. Given that the saint is a legendary figure, many items in the Koronus Expanse have an alleged connection to him. The answer to the question of how the Order of the Hammer is going to retrieve them depends on the identity of its next prelate."

languages.text: "Meclis, bir vakitler Aziz Cognatius'a ait olan ve bulunabilmesi mümkün olan tüm yadigârları elde etmeyi hedefliyor. Azizin efsanevi bir şahıs olduğu göz önünde bulundurulursa Koronus Enginliği'ndeki pek çok eşyanın kendisiyle bağlantısı olduğu iddia ediliyor. Ancak yadigâr sahiplerinin onlardan ayrılmaya hevesli olması pek olası görünmüyor. Çekiç Tarikatı'nın yadigârları nasıl ele geçireceğine dair sorunun cevabı, bir sonraki piskoposun kim olacağına bağlı."
languages.original_text: "The conclave aims to procure all the relics that once belonged to Saint Cognatius, all that can possibly be procured. Given that the saint is a legendary figure, many items in the Koronus Expanse have an alleged connection to him. However, it seems unlikely that any of the relics' owners will be eager to part with them. The answer to the question of how the Order of the Hammer is going to retrieve them depends on the identity of its next prelate."
